name: UP899468: WAKAWAKAWAKA
description:
Created in under 4 days using Unity for my 1st uni project.

See in-game for instructions. Navigate menus using mouse.

Turn on sound! (but not too loud)

Based off this tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLa5_l08N9jzMKA8gNHG42Mv3idfIkztBU

Sprites created by myself in Inkscape and animated within Unity

 Heavily inspired by Asteroids and Pac-Man

Particle effects are edited from  "Particle ingredient pack" by GAPH in the Unity asset store

Sound effects from www.sounds-resource.com

Font: Conthrax by Typodermic Fonts  (from dafont.com)
